name: Redemption?
description:
Redemption? - the simplest 3D novel in which you will have to make fateful decisions, playing for a man who died unexpectedly.In this game you will have to go through the stage of your life in which you made decisions and understand whether this choice was the right one and then at the end of your journey you will understand you are waiting for punishment or you were a good person.

Key Features:
1) Simple and intuitive gameplay.
2) Several different endings.
3) Nice graphics.
4) Your decisions affect the plot.
